summary: Provides a suite of command‑line tools for preparing conversational JSONL datasets for supervised fine‑tuning of large language models, including attribute annotation via an inference server, tokenization and length‑based cleaning, and conversion into Megatron‑LM formatted token files.
business_intent: Streamline the creation of high‑quality, attribute‑aware training data to accelerate fine‑tuning of large language models for tasks such as attribute prediction and conditioned text generation, supporting scalable deployment in production environments.
